thread.title: Mr Terry Jones
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mr Terry Jones

author: Mr Terry Jones
title: Mr Terry Jones
text: Found this company very efficient. An excellent website offering great choice and good advice on measuring for blinds. Easy to order. Good communication from the start through to delivery. We are very pleased with the quality of the blinds, which were delivered within a week. Thoroughly recommend this company.
